ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Soloing bards
ygData.msgSnippet: ... i ve been in more than one group where i had to contribute damage cuz we were so pathetic.  here was one, sk, enc, dru, cle, me.  the druid nuked
ygData.messageBody:
At 10:26 AM 1/30/01 -1000, you wrote:
>There's a problem with that sort of argument, though. If your primary goal
>as a bard is to do damage in the group, you're missing out on well over half
>of what the class can do that's more effective than adding more damage. I
>don't sing dots in a group, I'll leave the serious damage dealing to the
>tanks and casters. I'd rather make them more able to do their jobs than try
>to do it for them.
>
>Kaelrei

i've been in more than one group where i had to contribute damage cuz we were
so pathetic. here was one, sk, enc, dru, cle, me. the druid nuked occasionally,
but sk's damage really isn't that good. so i broke out the chants and helped out.
we cleared down to the bar in sebilis but then a couple folks had to leave.
